title: Cains Kosher Dill
generatedText: Are you trying to decide on a dill? Here's some information to help you decide whether Cains Kosher Dill is the right product for you. This product contains 5 calories, 0g grams of fat, 0g grams of protein, and 1g grams of carbs per serving. This product has 17 ingredients (in our experience: the fewer ingredients, the better!) This product contains no ingredients that some research suggests you should avoid.

ingredients.name: propylene glycol
ingredients.description: While propylene glycol is "generally regarded as safe" according to the FDA, its use in food is much more limited in Europe.

ingredients.name: food color
ingredients.description: Color additives are tricky - both colors that we might perceive as natural (e.g. fruit juice and turmeric) and artificial colors (e.g. Red 3) might turn up on a food label under "artifical color" or "color added." This makes it difficult to know how safe these colorings are, since you do not know exactly what you are consuming. The FDA is wise not to make a distinction, however, because the process of extracting natural colors is far from natural and these substances are not necessarily safer!

ingredientList: Cucumbers, Water, Distilled Vinegar, Salt, Calcium Chloride, Propylene Glycol, Polysorbate 80, Natural and Artificial Flavors, and Yellow 5 (Color)
